text:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/mod/mod_headers.html

In the table under the Header directive section 

"The time from when the request was received to the time the headers are sent on the wire. This is a measure of the duration of the request. The value is preceded by D=."

for clarity should read

"The time from when the request was received to the time the headers are sent on the wire. This is a measure of the duration of the request. The value is preceded by D=.  The value is measured in microseconds."
creator: pnee@toombeola.com
poirier@pobox.com
